mapper.select: /* Query ID : humanframe.bbs.creatTable.creatTrgtTableNm */ SELECT 'TN_BBS_TY${bbsTy}' 'TN_BBS_TY${bbsTy}_' || SEQ_BBS_TY${bbsTy}_TABLE_NM.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.update:
